name: MonsterTyper
description:
Product in "Early development" might receive some updates

Game is written in JavaScript and CSS/HTML

============= MONSTER TYPER =============

is a Simple Typing Game with Combo Counters and RPG Mechanics

============= Story ============= The Monsters have Invaded The City and having a strange power comes with strange responsibility. Type Your ENEMIES OUT!! ============= Controls =============

Use your KEYBOARD to type the enemies out and Clear Dungeons.

============= Updates =============

Other Mechanics will be Introduced Later and will be having periodic updates so stay tuned.

Things Like:

  • Arcade Mode
  • Leaderboards
  • Ranked Matchmaking

Will be added to the game so stay tuned.

============= Donate =============

Support The Game Developer aka d4nkf0x for developing the game a small donation can help a lot especially during these times.
